trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref> for an endpoint through configuration.

The WebHttpElement is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> sub-type that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior> behavior, when used in conjunction with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> binding, enables the Web programming model for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.
Note that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Web.WebServiceHost> automatically adds this behavior to endpoints that use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement"></xref> class.
This sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the message format can be automatically selected.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message format can be automatically selected; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
This sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebHttpElement>.
The <xref:System.Type> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.WebHttpBehavior"></xref>.
To be added.
Gets and sets the default message body style.
One of the values defined in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageBodyStyle"></xref> enumeration.
Gets and sets the default outgoing response format.
One of the values defined in the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Web.WebMessageFormat"></xref> enumeration.
Gets or sets the flag that specifies whether a FaultException is generated when an internal server error (HTTP status code: 500) occurs.
Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the flag is enabled; otherwise returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether help is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if help is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
